title: HeatFleet: HeatWeek
overview: A weekly news program that delivers concise and reliable updates on U.S. heating oil prices. Each episode breaks down state-by-state trends, examines key market movements, and explains how price shifts impact households and businesses. The show offers practical insights for consumers, industry professionals, and policymakers alike. For expanded data, interactive tools, and in-depth reports, viewers are directed to HeatFleet.com.
